definition: to float in the air/swiftly/nimbly/easy and relaxed
to float
correct/right/so/thus/like this/-ly
elated/light and airy feeling (after a few drinks)/smug and conceited/complacent

sentences.english: The chilly winter is far away and the spring is coming on.
sentences.chinese: 蕭索寒冬漸已遠去，春天飄然而至。

sentences.english: The dancers glided across the floor.
sentences.chinese: 跳舞的人在地板上飄然而過。

sentences.english: April, come she will, when streams are rip and swelled with rain.
sentences.chinese: 四月，春潮帶雨襲來之時，她挾一段愛飄然而至。

sentences.english: The snow decorated the car with a new look.
sentences.chinese: 飄然而至的雪花把這輛汽車重新雕塑了一番。

sentences.english: Distance produce beauty of soliciting, floating in the air.
sentences.chinese: 距離產生美感，飄然引人遐思。

sentences.english: If done correctly, the fluttering sensation will match the one in your heart.
sentences.chinese: 如果做得對，那飄然的感覺會相印在你們的心。

sentences.english: Telegraph poles are blurry, not so much pacing out the landscape as shimmying across it.
sentences.chinese: 模糊的電線杆無法在踩着狐步飄然而過時量出畫面。

sentences.english: Man, you have been walking on air for days.
sentences.chinese: 夥計，你最近這幾天都一副飄飄然的樣子。

sentences.english: Then, after a stretch arms and body like a goddess with a veil floating in the air over the region.
sentences.chinese: 於是一個兩臂後伸，身帶披紗的女神像飄然而至。

sentences.english: Don't make a woman's compliment, but often make men grow weary.
sentences.chinese: 恭維不會使女人飄然，卻往往使男人喪志。

sentences.english: The souls of a billion Chinese people are floating in the air.
sentences.chinese: 十億中國人民的靈魂飄然若空。

sentences.english: I think he's secretly revelling in all the attention.
sentences.chinese: 我覺得他對於能夠引起廣泛的注意心裏感到飄飄然。

sentences.english: Says Mr. Goldsmith: 'Strong leaders don't coast.'
sentences.chinese: 戈德史密斯說，強有力的領導人不會飄飄然。

sentences.english: He finally drifted in half an hour after everyone else.
sentences.chinese: 他終於飄然而至，比別人遲到了半個鐘頭。

sentences.english: She breezed out without paying attention to anyone.
sentences.chinese: 她不理睬任何人，飄然而去。

definition: mundane world (in religious context)/this mortal coil
a snap of the fingers/a short moment/in a flash/in the twinkling of an eye
to float about/to flutter (in the breeze)/(dialect) gay guy/(Tw) ghost
carefree/leisurely
to look around/to care for
the world of mortals (Buddhism)/human society/worldly affairs
cluster of flowers/inflorescence/flowering shrub
belt/sash/attire (clothes and belt)
wind-borne/tossed about by the wind
luan and phoenix/husband and wife/virtuous person/sovereign/belle
to lie in disarray/to cut across/to traverse
free of worldly concerns/above the fray/at peace with the world
Canglang district of Suzhou city 蘇州市|苏州市[Su1 zhou1 shi4], Jiangsu
cool breeze/fig. pure and honest
see 飄渺|飘渺[piao1 miao3]
desolate/empty
